feed.title: Penter Lab
feed.subtitle: Understanding cancer and immune cell interactions using large-scale single cell genomics approaches.

entry.title: Funding from BIH Charité Digital Clinician Scientist Program

link.title: Funding from BIH Charité Digital Clinician Scientist Program

entry.content:
We are grateful for research funding from the BIH Charité Digital Clinician Scientist Program that will provide Livius with 50% protected research time for a period of 3 years.
A big thank you to Prof. Dr. med. Frederik Damm and Prof. Dr. rer. nat. Nils Blüthgen for supporting the application!
entry.summary: We are grateful for research funding from the BIH Charité Digital Clinician Scientist Program that will provide Livius with 50% protected research time for a period of 3 years. A big thank you to Prof. Dr. med. Frederik Damm and Prof. Dr. rer. nat. Nils Blüthgen for supporting the application!
